name: Slay All Goblins
description: Casual hack and slash with bits of visual novel elements! Free to play 2D hack and slash game, with pixel art and animations. This is a mobile to PC port, with high res images & XBOX controller support (recommended).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support Storage: 300 MB available space
